markdownRemark.html:
PDF Generation

Creating simple PDFs programmatically is pretty easy. There are plenty of solutions out there that are simple to use. You give it some HTML and some CSS and "BAM!" you got a PDF. H

to match designs is hard. If you've ever had to do this you probably agree with me.

There are a lot of open-source libraries out there that enable you to generate PDFs. There is wkhtmltopdf that is a CLI tool that can be used on the server and plenty of other solutions for the browser. However, based on my experience I've kept facing the same issues:

frontmatter.title: Generating sophisticated PDFs with NodeJS and Puppeteer
